summary: This mod will change your bound weapon (sword, bow and battle axe) damage to double, triple or quadruple.
descriptionHtml:
This will change your bound weapon (sword, bow and battle axe) damage to double, triple or quadruple.

Please choose only one esp:
doublebounddmg = 2x damage
triplebounddmg = 3x damage
quadruplebounddmg = 4x damage

i only have tested this mod on my own game, please tell me if this mod doesn\'t work on your game :)
enjoy!
author: DNA3
